record.darwin:Remarks: Specimens were captured and released in the field after fin clips were taken and PIT tag inserted. These are the corresponding PIT tag numbers and other information: #1 (Recap - in vial within a jar with NCSM 41691): 42377C464D, male, 715 mm TL, 4925 g; #2: 4876623A03, male, 614 mm TL, 3700 g; #3 (Recap - in vial within a jar with NCSM 41690 and 46062): 4237702A30, male, 641 mm TL, 3665 g; #4: 486B752F43, male, 622 mm TL, 3315 g. Scales were taken of each of the specimens and were sent to Robert E. Jenkins in June 2008.
